``` {css}

h1.title {
  display: none;
}

.banner {
  width: 100%;
  height: 50px;
  background-color: #008cba;
  color: #f5f5f5;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 0 20px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 1000;
}

.title {
  font-size: 18px;
}

.banner a {
  color: #f5f5f5;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.banner a:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

body {
  font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
  margin: 70px 20px 20px 20px;
  background-color: #f9f9f9;
}

.figure-container {
  position: relative;
  flex: 0 1 calc(50% - 20px);
  width: 300px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 5px;
  border: 1px solid #ddd;
  border-radius: 5px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  background-color: white;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.figure-container img {
  max-width: 100%;              /* Scales image proportionally */
  height: auto;
  max-height: 200px;
  margin-bottom: 10px;          /* Space below the image */
}

.figure-text {
  font-size: 20px;
  margin-bottom:10px;
  margin-top:10px;
}

.figure-container:hover {
  box-shadow: 0 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);

}

.figure-hover-grey {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); /* Semi-transparent grey */
  z-index: 1; /* Ensure it's below the white box */
  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity 0.3s;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.figure-hover-text {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -60%); /* Center the box */
  background-color: white; /* White background */
  color: black; /* Dark text */
  text-align: center;
  padding: 15px;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  border-radius: 5px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  font-size: 14px;
  z-index: 2; /* Ensure it is above the grey overlay */
  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity 0.3s;
  width: 80%; /* Adjust box width to fit content */
}

.figure-container:hover .figure-hover-grey {
  opacity: 1; /* Show grey overlay */
}

.figure-container:hover .figure-hover-text {
  opacity: 1; /* Show white box with text */
}

.grid {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;              /* Allows wrapping of items to new rows */
  gap: 10px;                    /* Vertical and horizontal gap between items */
  justify-content: flex-start;  /* Align items at the start of each row */
}

@media (max-width: 880px) {
  .grid {
    flex-direction: column;   /* Switch to a single column layout */
    align-items: stretch;     /* Stretch the items to the full width of the container */
  }
  .figure-container {
    width: 100%;              /* Make figure container take full width */
    margin: 0 0 10px 0;       /* Ensure some gap between items */
  }
  .text-container {
    width: 100%;              /* Make it take up the full width on small screens */
    margin: 0 0 10px 0;
    grid-column: span 1;     
  }
}

.text-container {
  width: 880px;
  max-width: 100%;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 15px;
  border: 1px solid #ddd;
  border-radius: 5px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  background-color: white;
  text-align: left;
  font-size: 16px;
  grid-column: span 2;
}

.text-container p {
  font-size: 14px;
  margin-top: 0px;
}

.text-container h1 {
  font-size: 18px;
  margin-top: 0px;
}

.copyright {
  font-size: 12px;
  text-align: center;
}
```

```{r, results='asis'}

content <- read.xlsx("content.xlsx")

for (i in 1:length(content$title)) {
  
  title <- content$title[i]
  plot <- paste0("plots/", content$plot[i])
  link <- content$link[i]
  hover_text <- content$hover_text[i]
  
  cat(paste0("<div class='figure-container'>"))
  cat(paste0("<a href='", link, "' style='display: block; text-decoration: none;'>"))
  
  cat(paste0("<div class='figure-hover-grey'></div>"))
  cat(paste0("<div class='figure-hover-text'>", hover_text, "</div>"))
  
  cat(paste0("<div class='figure-text'>", title, "</div>"))
  cat(paste0("<img src='", plot, "' />"))
  cat("</a>")
  cat("</div>")
  
}
```
